transfer_stats_daily_insert.queryString: INSERT INTO transfer_stats(year, month, day, svc_num, transfer_type, week, svc_grp_id, svc_name, transfer_count, amount_sum, fee_sum) SELECT year(subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day)), month(subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day)), day(subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day)), svc_num, type, weekofyear(subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day)), svc_grp_id, name, transfer_count, amount_sum, fee_sum FROM (select s.svc_num, t.type, s.svc_grp_id, s.name, count(*) as transfer_count, ifnull(sum(t.amount),0) as amount_sum, ifnull(sum(t.fee),0) as fee_sum from transfer as t inner join service as s on s.svc_num=t.svc_num where t.transfer_reg_dt >= subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day) and t.transfer_reg_dt < curdate() group by s.svc_grp_id, s.svc_num, t.type) as stat ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE transfer_count=stat.transfer_count, amount_sum=stat.amount_sum, fee_sum=stat.fee_sum;

link_stats_daily_insert.queryString: INSERT INTO link_stats(year, month, day, svc_grp_id, klip_new, week, link_count) SELECT year(subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day)), month(subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day)), day(subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day)), svc_grp_id, klip_new, weekofyear(subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day)), link_count FROM (select svc_grp_id, klip_new, count(*) as link_count from link where reg_dt >= subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day) and reg_dt < curdate() group by svc_grp_id, klip_new) as stat ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE link_count=stat.link_count;

accounting_stats_insert.queryString: INSERT INTO accounting_stats(year, month, day, accnt_id, type, svc_grp_id, week, svc_num, svc_name, transfer_count, amount_sum, fee_sum) SELECT year(subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day)), month(subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day)), day(subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day)), accnt_id, type, svc_grp_id, weekofyear(subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day)), ifnull(svc_num, 0) as svc_num, name, transfer_count, amount_sum, fee_sum FROM ( select kt.accnt_id as accnt_id, kt.type as type, ifnull(s.svc_grp_id, 'external') as svc_grp_id, s.svc_num, s.name, count(*) as transfer_count, ifnull(sum(kt.amount),0) as amount_sum, ifnull(sum(kt.fee),0) as fee_sum from kas_transfer as kt left outer join transfer as t on kt.tx_hash = t.tx_hash left join service as s on t.svc_num = s.svc_num where kt.transfer_reg_dt >= subdate(curdate(),interval 1 day) and kt.transfer_reg_dt < subdate(curdate(),interval 0 day)group by kt.accnt_id, kt.type, s.svc_grp_id, s.svc_num) as stat ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE transfer_count=stat.transfer_count, amount_sum=stat.amount_sum, fee_sum=stat.fee_sum;
